all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And if any man shall seek to build up himself, and seeketh not my counsel, he shall have no power, and his folly shall be made manifest.
Doctrine and Covenants 136:19
Quote of the Day
"The temple provides a continuing remembrance of the Savior’s Atonement and what it overcomes."
Elder Quentin L. Cook | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
